channel.title: 517 - Attacking
channel.description: Im using Rofl-PvP source as a base and if you keep clicking attack on a npc or a player, everytime you click attack, it displays the attack anim, like a mass instead it doesnt hit. when i used armadyl spec on zammy gwd boss, it speced and then normal attack came fast.

item.title: 517 - Attacking
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Im using Rofl-PvP source as a base and if you keep clicking attack on a npc or a player, everytime you click attack, it displays the attack anim, like a mass instead it doesnt hit.
when i used armadyl spec on zammy gwd boss, it speced and then normal attack came fast.

Read full topic
